page.title: 08PRINKNASH ABBEY
page.content: The twelfth century abbey has big modern buildings too.The {monks} pursue their traditional way of life as well as promoting {tourism}. Attractions include pottery,cafe,bird and garden centres.Visitors also pray in church. 25 monks live there and rise together at 04.40.They then go to an hour-long mass.A boy spent a whole day there - "All the monks kneel at the altar and then they go to their stalls.They are chanting a Latin prayer until everyone is settled."At breakfast-"The men stand by their places and say Grace in Latin, then they sit and eat in total silence. When they have finished they rinse their cutlery in cold water and wipe it with their napkins.They then return to mass".Tasks include gardening whilst spare time can be spent at the 44000 book library.
